definitions.definition: A principle or example or measure used for comparison.
A vertical pole with something at its apex.
The upper petal or banner of a papilionaceous corolla.
An inverted knee timber placed upon the deck instead of beneath it, with its vertical branch turned upward from that which lies horizontally.
Standard idiom, a prestigious or standardized language variety; standard language
Falling within an accepted range of size, amount, power, quality, etc.
(of a tree or shrub) Growing alone as a free-standing plant; not trained on a post etc.

definitions.example: standard works in history; standard authors

definitions.definition: Of a usable or serviceable grade or quality.
(of a motor vehicle) Having a manual transmission.
